toys.name: Spider-Man
toys.description: Bring the power of Iron Man to your collection with this highly detailed action figure. Featuring the iconic red and gold armor design, this figure is perfect for fans of the Marvel Cinematic Universe and comic book enthusiasts.

toys.name: Iron Man
toys.description: The figure stands at 6 inches tall and is fully articulated for dynamic poses and action-packed play. Collect other figures from the Marvel Legends series to assemble the ultimate superhero team!

toys.name: Iron Man

toys.name: Hulk
toys.toy_name: Marvel Avengers Hulk Gamma Grip Fists
toys.description: Unleash the power of the Hulk with these Gamma Grip Fists. With these oversized fists, you can smash and bash like the mighty Avenger. Grip, flex, and smash your way through epic battles with these incredible Hulk fists!
